Forty minutes to Colombo via Expressway. Ideal for Doctors or expatriates/foreigners to use as the consultation or office/ accommodation/ Circuit bungalow in the quiet and village-like neighborhood in Sri Lanka.  Kalutara South Town, Nagoda Public Hospital, Phillips Memorial Hospital, Police Training School, supermarkets, schools, ocean beaches, Five Star Beach Hotels like Anantara Kalutara Resort, Avani Kalutara, Hotel Coconut Bay Palm Beach Hotel, and other amenities are within the radius of two to three kilometers• Complete tiled flooring including on all balconies with large 6 bedrooms and 5 baths (Two en-suite on the lower level and One on Upper level (Total three en-suite)) • Kitchen with granite pantry top, polished class one timber cupboards and under mount sink. Well and pipe born water with 2 overhead water tanks with street line water connection. An additional outer stairway for the upstairs.• Extra detached kitchen with servant facilities (bath, toilet & room) • An open car porch for two vehicles, entrance lobby with a spacious balcony• 77 perches (vegetation with matured mango, jackfruit, and coconut trees included)• The entire land is covered by a 7ft parapet wall strengthened by RCC columns and beams & color washed with two gated entrances from northern and west sides of the property secured by two iron sliding gates fixed (wired for auto operation). A modern Home Security alarm system installed. • Beautifully polished, solid wooden interior & exterior, with SLT telephone and cable TV connection, single phase electricity, French windows.
